summary: This document is a daily log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for August 9, 2019, detailing inmate movements, status changes, and administrative actions. It appears to be a standard prison operations record from the day Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated.

events.title: MCC Daily Log Entries
events.description: A series of administrative entries in the Metropolitan Correctional Center's daily log, recording inmate movements, status changes (like bail/bond, hospital release, transfers), and other facility operations.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (MCC NY)
keyFacts: The document is a daily operational log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated August 9, 2019.
It records various inmate movements and status changes using codes (e.g., BAIL/BOND, HOSP, TRANS, ADM CHANGE).
The log is generated from the Bureau of Prisons' SENTRY system, indicating it is an official federal prison record.
